tool_description: Sentiment Analysis 2.0 for Hostel Reviews - Cognitive API specially designed for Hostel Reviews.
name: Sentiment Analysis 2.0 for Hostel Reviews
title: Sentiment Analysis 2.0 for Hostel Reviews

api_list.name: process
api_list.description:
This endpoint returns all results in one output: general sentiment, aspects, categories, semantic analysis, and a semantic summary. So, you pay only once.

The input "text" is required, the input "title" is optional.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.default: We stayed in this hostel for one night because it was close to the airport. The check in lasts 30mins so we got a little bit angry but it was because there was a lot of people. Beside that, everything was fine. Shared bathrooms were not overcrowded, common room has bilard and ping-pong. At the end we had some troubles with the payments because they accepted only cash. Good value for money. Overall it is a good choice.
